long_description: This canteen is easy-to-fill and a real space saver in your pack. Multi-layer material offers strength; remains soft and flexible so it can be rolled when empty. Wide-mouth opening makes it easy to add ice cubes or powdered drink mixes without spilling; gusseted bottom allows the canteen to stand upright. Withstands both freezing and boiling temperatures from -20F to 220F. Thread pattern accommodates Nalgene-compatible water filters. Loop-top retainer prevents the cap from getting lost.
short_description: This canteen is easy-to-fill and a real space saver in your pack.
